Probe_Target_Road: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Probe_Target_Road (mesh_code VARCHAR(32), inflow_node VARCHAR(32), outflow_node VARCHAR(32), memo VARCHAR(128), INDEX idx_mesh_code (mesh_code), INDEX idx_inflow_node (inflow_node), INDEX idx_outflow_node (outflow_node))
